Reviews.Title: “Great location & price in the mix of a lively plaza”
Reviews.Author: j3dnight
Reviews.Content: trip spain time spent madrid hotel central location transportation options getting daytrips hostal plaza choice metro nearby puerto del sol easily train stations segovia toledo hop onhop bus stop street lot attractions walking distance single moved bigger surely appreciated located lively plaza safe shops restaurants pubs nearby staff helpful friendly im happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Terrible hostel, bad for even budget hostels”
Reviews.Author: Plavec_H
Reviews.Content: imaginable halfway bed table elevated tv rested laying reach shower cheap budget expect especially size 5 feet 6 smelled smoke cigarette burns sheets quality cigarette burns sheets recommend elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “they charged us twice! never go here!”
Reviews.Author: Wiggily
Reviews.Content: people charged twice night refusing return money provided copies bank account statements treating horribly replying email etc filthy dont speak english horrible please avoid cost

Reviews.Title: “Really pleasant hostel”
Reviews.Author: marguarite82
Reviews.Content: nice stay hostel twin bathroom 202 euro 4 nights staff helpful location excellent 5 min walking sol cleaned day disadvantage lift 4th floor compared else wasn´t bad

HotelInfo.Name: Hostal Plaza D'ort
HotelInfo.Address: Plaza del Angel 13, 28012 Madrid, Spain
